# ColorType enumeration

The color types used in the PNG image.

```csharp
[Flags]
public enum ColorType
```

## Values

| name | value | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Greyscale | `0x0` | Greyscale. |
| PaletteUsed | `0x1` | Palette used. |
| TruecolorUsed | `0x2` | Truecolor used. |
| AlphaUsed | `0x4` | Alpha used. |
